Works great. Now I can game on the couch with no lag. Multiplayer games felt weird with 4 people crammed behind my computer, and this was a cheap and easy solution. The cable is thicker than normal which is good since you will probably be running it long distance and want some added durability.

I love these HDMI cords! They do what they are supposed to do and the length is super convenient! It allows me to connect my laptop to my television from my couch. The only reason I am giving this product four stars is because after a few months of heavy use they begin to fail causing visual and audio glitches. I unplug the cord often which I believe causes the cord to deteriorate over time. If you leave it plugged into your devices I am sure these cords will last you a long time!

When I first got the cables I used one right away and it seemed to work ok at first but I started to notice pixel issues randomly occurring on the screen. The second cable I did not use right away, but when I went to use it I found it did not work at all and left the screen blank. Too much time has passed for a refund.
Perfect size for dual monitors and to connect to Nintendo console

This thing is about twice as thick as a 'normal' HDMI cable.  It runs along walls for my use, so no big deal, but be prepared for that.  Otherwise this thing works great.  Just using for a 1080p projector, so can't comment on anything else about it and 4k content.

I can't get  any audio to play while I use these cords. which is even more disappointing because it was a gift for my great grandmother so she could watch church on tv during quarantine. It wasn't a quick delivery and it seems like I wanted my money and time here
This cable is just long enough to run through my installed conduit. No more cables going from behind t.v. in plain sight over to dvd player. This sturdier than my previous cable. Good picture.

does as intended, I haven't ran it through any diagnostics or anything like that, as I simply just needed this to hook up my second monitor for streaming. Only thing I found kinda odd was how thick this cord is, I'd imagine it's for wall installs but if you aren't running this wire through some walls beware how this cord will look (if you're super into making your cords look nice.)

For 2 day shipping, it took 10 days but that’s fine because it works fine. I would suggest the 6 ft one for I was gonna get the 3 footer but it wouldn’t even fit around my tv to where my PS4 was so probably go for the 6

Cable much thicker than any HDMI cable i've ever seen. I guess 5/16" in diameter. 2 wouldn't fit it the frame pocket of my TV mount and takes up enough room that TV won't go flat to wall now. I would not recommend this cable if you need to make any tight bends. Picture and sound seem good. .

The cable between the two connectors must contain very small gauge individual wires but it does work very well. I wouldn't want to try any bending or tugging unless it was strictly using my fingers on only the connector.
this cable help in the In  home cctv install from the dvr to tv now its all in HD lol it was way lower in price and same quality as the one at the local dept store
I could not get it to work with my computer and monitor the driver did not work

These cables are excellent quality for the money.  They are heavier duty than the ones I was replacing and provided a better picture quality.  They did not cost much more than the cheapos I was replacing.

They were not packaged.  just the wire in the bag.  it is of good quality and worked very well.  It had caps on the ends of the plugs to keep them clean and the wire has no scratches it is obviously new, but not in a packaging.  I will provide pictures to show what you get.  Anyway if you found my review  helpful please click yes so I know it was good.  thanks
Does what is intended to do. Only think I wasnt thrilled about, diameter is thick. Just ads to difficulty of concealment. But then again, it's my own application, may not be an issue for you.

These cables have worked perfectly, as I am sure you know if you have kids/teens, you can not keep charging cables where you put them, and when you do demand them to be brought back they bring them back broken, because they just pull them quickly off what ever they are charging and break connections inside the cables or have rolled over them with their chairs.  At this price I always keep a few on hand for use when I need a cable to charge my items.

Had to hook up a new DVD player to my entertainment system.  Had a short 12" one and a long 6' one.  Needed a 3' one.Found one on Amazon Basics, ordered it and it arrived the next day.  Worked great, cant beat the speed, convenience and quality.
I bought these for my moms new tv I hear that gold is best conductor we will see and they work wonderful Five stars to you and your company for such good work done well !Thank you Julie Moskwa

Amazon Basics are good quality cables for a fair price. HDMI cables are notoriously overpriced, especially at big box stores. This Amazon HDMI cable allowed me to hook up my PC monitor without spending too much money to do so. It works just as it should, and seems well built.

I've been using 3 of these cables for nearly a year with a Sony 900f 4k smart TV, Sony smart Blu-Ray player, Philips DVD and Roku steaming devices. Picture is sharp and clean with all sources. They're performing as advertised. Will be getting a Sony 4K UHD Blu-Ray player and plan to use one these cables with that one as well.

Hello i have gotten this HDMI with the HDMI spliter since i am a Streamer on Twitch and i got both for good price. just mostly need now is a capture card and after that i got it ready so mostly i can say get one for what you need this days now

If you want only a good cable without any fancy stuff like some manufacturers put on their cable just to increase its value, buy this.It does the job, it's probably 2.2 (i've tested it on monitor, which uses 240hz only with HDMI 2.0 and it works), it's has faster response than the DP 1.4 that i got when i purchased the monitor.
A cheap quality material. Too stiff, so looks clumsy.  I was hoping for a better quality product.Anyway, does the job.  Needed a few for home office. It is not recommended for living room AV systems.

Cable works great for 4k UHD. I'm using these between my 4k BD player, 4k Home theater receiver and 4k OLED TV. So far, not a single hiccup in the audio or video.Even ARC is working well streaming through the TV with audio going back to the AVR. These are also much thinner than the cables I replaced so routing is a lot neater in the back of the rack.

HDMI cables are a complete ripoff... except for these. It's a digital cable, so gold fittings, copper wire and braided metal sheathing aren't going to make a bit of difference except under the harshest of conditions. It's just ones and zeroes, so signal strength, amplitude and fidelity don't matter at all; as long as the signal gets through, it gets through perfectly. So don't spend a ton of money on super cables, just get these.
I sprayed this with Pam so that it could slide through a plastic ridged wall channel. It was able to slide right through and still works great. Seems like a very heavy duty cable

I have officially started purchasing AmazonBasics cables for all my replacement cables and for my "extra" cables to have around our home.I have ordered multiple sets of the HDMI cables, in varying lengths, and they have all worked exactly as advertised. I don't have a good reason at this point in time to spend any more than what Amazon charges for these.

Cable works. I don't see any diiferentiation in quality versus more expensive cables. For everyday office use and watching YouTube, the AMZN cables do a fine job. The 2 pack makes the value even more compelling. Would buy again.

I bought a new item backed entertainment center and wanted to neaten things up with shorter cables. I replaced all of my HDMI cables with these. I have a 70" Sony 4K tv. My Xbox oneS and kindle fire now send an awesome UHD signal to the tv and the old mess of could cables is gone. Forget paying $$ hundreds for monster cables (which I almost did) these work just add well fit a fraction of the cost. Audio, video, ARC, 3D all work flawlessly at 4K /60fps.

I've had no issues with this and I've had it for over 2 years. I works well for the purpose I needed it for. I connected my laptop to my television. The only thing is I should have bought a longer one.

Worked for what I needed it for. I mounted my tv above my fireplace. I have my PlayStation 4 on a entertainment center that’s is lower to the floor. Had to buy to so that it would reach. Always buy amazon basics hdmi and will in the future. Not worth spending more on any other brand.
This cable works great!  Fair warning, it is a bit thicker and heavier than typical for shorter cables, but it transmits the picture perfectly and works great with my Epson projector.

Two reasonably-priced high-speed HDMI cables, being used for Blu-Ray to older AV receiver and Blu-Ray to older plasma TV.  Six feet was a little longer than I needed, but they're flexible and the connectors fit tightly.

This is the LOWEST standard AmazonBasics could achieve. Apple TV 4k will not allow this to perform HDR at good quality because of the low-end standard 18Gb/s transfer speeds. Please invest in the Belkin HDMI cable capable of 46-48Gb/s transfer speeds.

Unfortunately these cables are not reliable.  I have been thinking I had a problem with my Sony HT-NT5 soundbar, which I have connected to a Sony  XBR65X930D, but it turned out to be these cables all along.  The issue is that intermittently the video will stop working, and then stay not working until powering off for a while and trying again some time later.  I bought these cables based on the number of reviews and 4.5 stars, but it turns out these are not sufficient for the latest technology.
I thaught most cables were the same.Not true.

I don't know why you would ever pay the name brand price when you have these good quality cables at the low cost that they are. I own several of the amazon brand cables and have never had any issues of quality in the cable or signal. Would purchase again.

No complaints at all about any aspect of this cable. It works great, is well made, and is bendy enough to get into tight spots without a problem. Great price as well.  I got it since it was the top cable recommendation on Cnet and Wirecutter, and am glad I did. Excellent value for the price.
The cable worked fine, but the cord was too Thick for the hook up location. I will order a much thinner cable now.  You get your moneys worth, this is a sturdy cable for the price.

Feel like a pretty "basic" cable. I bought them because they were supposed to be 4K ARC (audio return channel) ready. Well, after 2 days, they stopped passing the audio. After much trouble shooting, simply replaced them with a better quality cable solved the problem. It's a return for me. I got plenty hdmi cables that can't handle the 4k arc. I don't need to add them to my pile.
I loved the HDMI cable and it works excellent. I use it for my Roku-3 gaming device and for watching other websites on my TV. It came really nicely packaged and was ready to use.

Excellent quality, especially for the price. It was the same price as a 15 foot cable that was of cheaper quality. I use this in my classroom and the thicker cable holds up to accidental bumps by kids from time to time.

Almost a year after purchasing this cable it began to fail, with white "sparkles" appearing in the image of my 4K TV consistent with what's known to happen when HDMI cables fail. Seems like a good deal but spend a few bucks more on something a little better.

This is a high quality cable compared with the cheap cables you find on popular online auction sites, and looks identical to the ones you find in retail stores for $20. The connectors slide positively into the ports and fit firmly after installation (there's no 'wobble' as with poorly made cables). Six feet is a short distance so be sure to measure properly.

I have been watching various videos on line for years, especially Prime videos. It so nice to now watch  and hear them on a larger screen.  Set up was super easy.  I turned off my tv, plugged one end of the HDMI cable into the HDMI2 TV slot and one into the HDMI slot on my laptop. Turned the TV on and used the channel tuner to change it to HDMI2.  (HDMI1 was in use by my Blue Ray play.  You should be able to use any HDMI slot, just because you select that one on your turner. )

I've been using this product for a few months now. I have it connecting my laptop to my desktop monitor. It works just fine. I haven't had any issues with it. The cable is thick, which leads me to believe it's pretty durable. This price is decent too.

I was unable to get good picture quality with an older HDMI cable and purchased this as a replacement. WOW!! The video quality was enhanced and the sound is excellent. I highly recommend this product.

These are a great value in HDMI cables. Amazon Basics will never be the highest picture quality, best materials, etc. However, it is nearly impossible to beat the value. Using this with a FireTV cube and it works well. No complaints and very happy with the value for the money.

I love Amazon Basics and these did not fail me. It was just the right size for my needs and picture quality is excellent.  I'm going to purchase more Amazon Basics goods when I need them. Especially the electronics.

I own a couple of AmazonBasic wiring products such as the USB to micro cords for my PS4 controllers and multiple USB chargers for our phones. AmazonBasic products are great in quality honestly and very long lasting, haven't had any issues with them.

Bought this so that I can connect computer to home theatre system.  Works fine. note that the cable is rather thick and kind of unwieldy to run across the room. but the picture and audio quality is good.
This cable is fairly thick, roughly twice as thick as a standard HDMI, so if you're planning on trying to place it in conduit or something, keep that in mind.

I bought 2x2 packs of these cables and not a single one of them works with my new UHD 4k TV. Every time I try to play 4k content from Amazon through my Roku I get a HDCP Unauthorized error. Further doing so seems to cause my Roku to decide it isn't HDCP compliant and I cannot play any HDCP protected content until I restart the Roku. And yes I have successfully played UHD 4k content on this setup from other sources so I can only conclude that Amazon is the only provider enforcing HDCP 2.2.
Just what I needed to hook up a bunch of equipment to a new TV.  The short cables make such a difference when you have limited space.  Great connections, great service, great price.
Great little cable.  I actually ordered the wrong cable.  I really wanted a M/F cable to connect a Roku stick.  I ended up using an HDMI coupler adapter to convert one end to female

I bought 2 of these cables for a new TV installation. At 15 feet, they were just barely long enough for my setup. I had some concern that simple cables at this length might have problems, but not a hint of that. I just love it when you can buy something 'basic' and it "just works".

When you bundle up these by two it is a great help especially if you are trying to set up an audio system with receivers, their quality was great both came bundled in a good plastic bag, perfectly  round bounding by zip ties that make it difficult to damage in transit.  And, soft plastic protective covers for the hdmi connectors.  Great Buy I am Really Happy

Bought two of these to use with two computer monitors. They worked for about two days perfectly, then one monitor went out.  Spent a lot of time troubleshooting one of the monitors, then docking hub and pc.  Replaced the cable with a better quality one, and everything started working fine.  Shortly after the 2nd monitor went out too, I immediately replaced the cable with a better quality one and 2nd monitor worked just fine.  I wouldn't recommend risking your time with these.
it was actually just the right size in length for my 75 inch tv on the wall with the height of 72 inch distance from the ground  elevation.i purchase the wall mount to hide the cords of course .

I ordered 25ft. Video & sound quality is excellent. I'm not that savvy in tech issues, so the fact that I just plugged it in and it worked great is a big bonus for me. The cord is thick, so the coils don't relax easily. You have a big thick cord coils running for those of you with aesthetic cord concerns. That didn't bother me enough to keep me from ordering an additional 2 pack with the 3 & 15 ft cords.
We have had very good luck with Amazon Basics cables of various types.No failures so for.

A great price for connecting our laptop to the large screen tv.  Sometimes it's handy to show the kids something from YouTube or DiscoveryEducation.com on the tv.  Our church does some live bible studies and we can have a bunch of people over to watch.  Very handy.

I bought it to go with my new Tewell sound bar thinking the included AUX cable would be too short. https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07C3WGRBT/ref=oh_aui_search_asin_title?ie=UTF8&psc=1 but there was no sound at all. When I trouble shot by trying the AUX cable that came with the sound bar, it worked fine.

These cables are so fat that I can not close the cable management system we have with them inside. Since the return window had closed I had to buy more from another vendor. Just be aware that these are unusually fat cables if you are trying to hide them in a cable management container, it could be an issue.

High-speed HDMI is all but necessary these days and Amazon puts out a great solution, no waiting around for promo codes/sales/etc. Cords have better flexibility and feel more expensive than all my other HDMI cables too.

I purchased this product to connect my lap top to a projector and it worked Great.  I was able to play a DVD on my laptop and project it to the wall as well as project any program I'm running from the laptop.  Had no problems at all.

Ended up being slightly disappointed by this I was excited to have better picture quality for my 4K TV, but it actually ended up making it slightly worse it could be that I don't have a 4K video player. Amazon was great and refunded me without me having to return the item!

Great quality cable! This hdmi cable meets all the necessities and standards for home theater. It meets the standards for hdmi 2.0, high speed, with ethernet, and transfers 4k content. What more do you need? I have a few pairs currently hooked up to my Apple TV, Playstation 4, Denon 4100 receiver, and Samsung f8500 plasma. Everything sounds and looks great! Will purchase again in a heartbeat as I continue adding to my home theater!

these cables got me out of a pinch i was running cables in my new home and needed them to go into the wall and out of my entertainment center and it worked flawlessly i still have one extra they are good quality and do the job!! would buy again but wont need to since it comes with multiple (the best part)
I don't move my stuff often if ever so as long as the cables work they will work forever lol. These cables seem decently built and every device going through my receiver is registering 4k

It's a good thing I did get new HDMI cables, my old ones was messing my Bolva tv up and causing flickering problems, so sense I put the new HDMI cables on my Bolva 40 inch tv, it works much better now, thanks Amazon.  😁👍

My LG C7 TV constantly flashes a static screen while using this cable with my Xbox One X and PC. Whether in HDR mode or not, 4k or 1080p. Switched to the cable that came with the Xbox and all issues went away with both devices. Tried with my other HDMI cables that I have, no problem. Tried all cables from this bundle and they are all incapable of handling a signal consistantly at all. These cable are not reliable at 10 feet.

I purchased the cable to stream from my Dell laptop to my smart tv. The connectors were about 1/8th” too wide. The description says they should be correct but, “No.”. I’m at a loss as to what to get now.

I'm actually pleasantly surprised by this HDMI chord. I was on the market for a new one considering the one I had was not communicating with our PS3 system anymore. I'm not very experienced with technology in terms of resolution, picture quality, etc. There are sooooo many options for HDMI chords it's rather overwhelming because I didn't want to spend too much as the TV we have is an older Samsung LCD and when we do we watch Netflix/HULU using the PS3. This chord was very affordable so I was concerned about whether or not it would compromise picture quality or functionality. But NO! This chord does exactly what it's meant to and the picture quality is just as the one I was using before. For my purposes I didn't need a fancy chord that costs more than $7, not because I'm being frugal but simply because I didn't need something of the sort. I'm more than satisfied with this purchase. The chord is 6 ft long, well made, and very securely packaged. I have included some pictures to give you an idea of what it looks like. Definitely recommend this chord.

I'd to get another one because the one that AT&T gave us for our family room it was not working correctly! AT&T came out to do some research on the DVR box and they switched out the box and not the HDMI cable and our television network would freeze up and go in and out while we were watching the television shows.
Was given a Fire stick and I have an older TV, this double HDMI cable helped me to achieve viewing between both.  Great value.  Leading chain store the same product costs $21!
I accidentally ordered another cord not realizing one came with the projector I bought, but oh well! I'll probably lose or need another anyway! Delivered on time, and works perfect! Thank you!
Just fine.  No issues, no difference.  I particularly like the fact that they are flexible.  I have owned fancy ones with stiff cables, and they won't lay nice.  These were fine.
I did not get the same picture quality like my old ones of course we always are more expensive I guess you get what you pay if you’re looking for not a great output this is a deal for you

These are inexpensive and are able to deliver Dolby picture to my HD tv from AppleTV. Also I like the thickness of the cable. Used to replace my old braided cable that was way to thick and monsterous.
This cable was used by my daughter on her Playstation and it did the job. Picture quality was great. No skips or interruptions due to unstable connection. I recommend this product.
I bought a new one because the last one fell apart after general use: unplugging, moving around etc. It's a good product for the price, but there's totally some forced obsolesce here.
I don't have any fancy smancy TV setup, but this cable was just the thing to allow me to connect my iPad to my TV and control it from across the room. Well-made, works great.

Ordered a 15’ & a 25’ cable: both work great! 👍 Good picture & sound quality. I’ve had great success with all my Amazon Basics purchases. Original 25’ was defective so returned for replacement. Amazon always makes it right!

Very cheap and works great. Recently had a problem with an hdmi I got for a couple bucks less and I regret it since it messed up one of my hdmi ports so it's totally worth wasting a bit more money on this than cheap hdmi cables. AmazonBasics never lets me down.

What's not to like? The cable is the length I needed, supports the resolutions I want, seems to be made well, and was among the less expensive prices. If it proves to be durable, it will be a win for me.

This is a really well made HDMI cable..a perfect length to reach from any device,( I used with a dvr ota converter box,) and reaches one of the tv HDMI ports just fine. IF, however, you run long cable out , say to a mixer, next to your favorite chair, THIS will not be long enough. 8 feet is a good length, not too long or short. I recommend.

I'm usually thrilled with Amazon products but this one was a complete dud; spent hours trying to troubleshoot why my PC wouldn't connect and wound up being the HDMI. Bought the Mediabridge one for around the same price and works with no issues.

This 10 foot HDMI cable is great and high quality. Cable is thick and doesn't feel cheap. Connections have been solid and secure. I needed this cable to connect my PS3 to my TV. I needed this 10 foot cable so I can route the wire in a way I could hide it. The long length made that possible. No problems with this cable so far. The display is great as I play my games. There's no interruption such as static or any disturbance. I am getting full 1080 resolution as well. I recommend this cable if you need a 10 foot HDMI cable.

Here is a thing I got. It cannot connet with internet signal. The WIFI conneting is Ok. When I used the cable linked my Mac book and TV, the Macbook still connect my WIFI. However, the internet sgnal is dead. I can't open Google on my Macbook when I used it. I'm not sure is this only my problem or every production has same problem because the Nintendo's cable is fine. I used Nintendo's cable to connect betten my PC and TV. PC's WIFI and network all fine. If this production has something I need to know to fix It. Please Let me know. Thanks very much.
This is a great cable and it is made well. However it did not work for me because of the thickness of the cable and where I needed to put it. I would have used otherwise.
These are junk! I purchased 3, expecting to have issues with one. However, the lightning connector on each has failed after less than a month of use. Won't be buying Amazon "Basics" again.
Does not support HDMI 2.0 B

If you're looking for high end whatever to support your super ultra mega resolution application, you're not looking at these cables.If you want a normal HDMI cable to connect, A to B and price is important, this is what to pick.

allowed me t hook up my yamaha av amp to my new tv through the ARC HDMI ports.  This allowed the TV remote to control the receiver and the receiver to power on with the TV and automatically pick the right channel.
Rated low because package was labeled for two cords but there was only one in the box!  Evidently what or who was responsible for labeling the box, didn't pay attention.

The kit comes with a 3-foot and a 10-foot cable which I used to be able to hook up two monitors to my computer. Got a lot of benefit from switching from VGA to HDMI on my larger monitor. This was just right for what I needed.
Great HDMI cable for the price.  It worked perfectly and was delivered quickly.  I had 6 foot cables, but I needed the extra length to connect my home-built HTPC that sits on a shelf to the side.

Purchased a new 4K Blu-Ray player which required a high-speed cable.  This cable works perfectly with zero issues.  Plan to buy a couple extra for the price to keep a few spares on hand.  Would certainly purchase again.

Bought to replace the cable between my satellite box and my tv and am very happy with it.  Easy to install! Does the job, has enough length so I don't have to worry about it getting bent again when on of the kids messes with it or the tv.  Would highly recommend.

Well.  It works OK for a few days on my Apple TV 4K.  Then I get symptoms of a bad cable.  After a long chat with Apple, I ordered the Belkin High speed.  This cable is fine for gereric HDMI uses but I wish I would have bought Belkin en the beginning.  I was trying to save a buck and lost.

Only one female end works.  Can't use two media players at the same time.  Was hoping to plug the Chromecast and a media player in and power only 1 at a time to keep from fumbling behind the TV searching for the TV plug.  Oh well.  Wasn't too expensive so I'm not out too much money.

I ordered two of these cables for my dorm room and I have to say I'm very disappointed with them. I've only had them for a couple of days but already I've had to unplug and replug them multiple times to get a clear picture. There seems to be some noise/interference occurring that only resolves itself if the cable is unplugged and then plugged back in.Cables are connecting an Xbox 360 to a Vizio TV. The issue doesn't occur when I use other cables.
It's an hdmi cord for $7. It plugs in to hdmi slots and produces the expected video and audio clarity. Build quality is what you can expect for this cheap. Not sure what else you can say

I needed two new 10" HDMI cables.  All local stores have 6" cables for $25 or more.  I found these on Amazon for less than half the price for two, but I was concerned that AmazonBasic cables would be like those super cheap thin generic cables.  However, I was wrong.  These cables look well made, fit well in HDMI ports ( not to loose, not to tight), and work great. They are thick and connectors feel very solid.  The price for quality and length seems very reasonable.
I bought these to use with my new HDMI switch, and they work perfectly. The length allowed everything to be hooked up easily.

I could never tell the difference in picture and sound quality when I use expensive cables as opposed to low price cables like these.  Maybe other people can, but as far as I am concerned these cables are just fine and thus a great deal.
Ordered this the same time we ordered a HDMI video splitter in conjunction with the splitter these two cords produced great quality pictures to two different TVs from one source
I needed a longer cord due to the tv we have has plug in area on the opposite side of where the receivers are stored. This was the best option rather than a complete rearrangement.
Gauge on this cable is thicker than most cables I have owned. Feels heavy duty super long cable & quality on picture is the same as my other expensive cables I have paid for.

Replaced some cables that did not support ARC or 4K video. Although I don't have equipment yet for 4K video I did need the ARC to allow my tv and receiver to work properly. These did the trick.  I also noticed much better sound and video after installing these. The cables I replaced were the ones with RedMere Technology which are directional.  They are much thinner than these but did not work as well in my opinion.  These cables are not very thick or heavy compared to other cables out there. For the price you cannot beat the quality of these cables.

We recently replaced all of the video signal cables (HDMI, Component, VGA, Composite) to one of our projectors in a large meeting room. This cable is functioning just a desired with no notable inference with the other cables. That's what I wanted, that's what I got.
Highly recommend AmazonBasics cabling.
Great cable, very reasonable price.Amazon really asks us to rate the video quality? It does have the latest rating, so it’s good for 4k uhd

Using a 4K TV as computer monitor.  Even though these are the least expensive UHDMI cable I saw, they work fine.  I have bought other "4K UHDMI" cables that did NOT work, but these 6' ones did.Not the most rugged looking cables around, but functional.  With digital, they work or they don't.  These work.

They need to have instructions besides the hard to read little tags on the ends that say source and display.  None of us had heard of connection specific HDMI cables, so the first time we tried it it did not work!  It is real easy to mix up the ends.  Once that is figured out the cable works great.

First cable that was sent immediately had a defect that allowed the interior wires to start showing and began to bulge out, and it was starting to fail, replacement does not have this issue (yet) and so it's very obviously cheaply made, but since you are getting a great warranty, and it's beyond cheaper than retail stores, i say go for it if you need a HDMI cable.
Used to hook up LG 50 inch tv which advised using a current/recent item for maximum performance.  Works very well.  (LG recommends item be newer/manufactured after 2009.
I also gave this cable a 5 star rating but the cable failed after 8 months. Was a real pain to trouble shoot because I never thought the cable would go bad in that amount of time.

Great HDMI cable to connect my Apple TV to my TV. The cable is the right length and durable. Both the sound and video are  sharp and clear. I definitely recommend this product and would order again if I ever need a HDMI cable.
Perfect for what we need.

Price was great. Delivery was fast with my prime membership. It’s an HDMI cable, did what it was designed to be to do. I used it to connect my laptop to my larger computer monitor and used it as a TV for a while.

Bought it for my dual monitor setup at home. Connected them to 2 Samsung 24” and to my MacBook Pro late 2013. Haven’t had an issue with the cable but if it breaks sooner than it should I’ll return to update my review. Good price also.
Nothing spectacular about this cable. It works and does the job it is designed for. I have only used it a few times, so I can not recommend for or against purchasing this cable.

I had purchased a HDMI "splitter" (it's actually a switch), but the description didn't mention a cable! So, ordered this one in a short (3-feet) length. It's PERFECT. Now I can switch between satellite and ROKU with just a push of a button!

So far I've purchased a number of assorted cables and adapters from the Amazon Basics line and I've only been thrilled with the quality for the price.  The same cable sells for $20-$30 at retail shops near me.  The first time I gave them a try was with a couple of audio cables that have been serving beautifully for almost two years now with no signs of fatigue.  In all I'm mightily impressed.
Very heavy duty casing around wires makes alittle awkward to run from laptop to tv..like it weights a lot for the hdmi port?  picture and sound is perfect for my use.

People don't realize having a cable with gold plating doesn't improve signal despite false advertising on box. HDMI is digital not analogs. Data sent in the cable is digital. 0's and 1's. To see amazon provide the new 2.0 standard at an amazing price is wonderful. Don't fall for those overpriced cables! Amazon is the best cables out there and doesn't burn your wallet in the process.
Just plugged in the cables to my Roku and out to my TV and 27" monitor.  Press the button to switch the Roku to one or the other.  Full resolution to both.  Pleased as punch.

Needed this for my Apple TV and it worked perfectly. I do think it’s ridiculous that it doesn’t come with these cables and you don’t know till you go to install them. So dumb. But I’m glad these cables worked well and showed up fast. So that made it all better.
Amazon Basics makes some very good quality cables. Because they make so many you just have to make sure of what you are ordering. Very good cables. Will order again.

At first was a little skeptic about the 11 dollar price tag for a 25 foot cable, I know you can find HDMI's cheap online but you get what you pay for and typically anything under 20 bucks will break on you in a week. So i was pleasantly suprised by the immense thickness of this cable (seriously i mean it's a little redundantly thick) and it works great and haven't had any problems. I've only had it for about a week now but build quality seems on point so i dont expect any issues any time soon. good job amazon.

Best HDMI cable on the market. Retailers will make you spend over 100% more on HDMI cables. I purchased the 25 ft cable and use it to connect my laptop to my 49 inch TV. Displaying at 1080p, I see no latency issues while gaming which was my top concern with the lengthy cable but was overcome. I should note that the cable was a bit thicker than I expected but was not an issue for my project. The thickness is just around 1cm diameter.
I ran this under my rug across the room to connect my gaming computer to my 4k 50 inch tv. The picture looks good and the cable seems to be heavy duty. No complaints here.

Worked for a week or so and then had intermittent issues with connection. Then it completely stopped working. Switched the cables out and discovered the cable itself was faulty. Replaced it with another one from the multipack and hoping this one last longer. I guess for the price you can take a gamble.

I purchased this for use with my Hisense 4K television coupled with a 4k AppleTv. I was a bit nervous about the picture quality but when I plugged it in, it calibrates for Dolby Vision which is what I was looking for! Great price and good picture.

Works really great, these cables looks and feels premium, and they are also cheap, don’t get me wrong there is no room for compromises when it comes to these cables, they have solid build quality and the gold plated part just make them more reliable.if your expensive HDMI cable get damaged grab one of these at cheap price point and you will not regret it.

ed flawlessly (no artifacts, flickering or other issues), the other two did not work as well. I tried Twisted Veins HDMI cables as well and had similar issues. I finally picked up Monoprice cables and haven't had any problems. Most people have good luck with these cables in shorter lengths (6ft or less), however at 10ft or longer I recommend looking for something else if you are using these on a 4K display. This does not work well with HDMI switcher. I suspect that this does not carry enough of signal to make switcher to work.Other cables came with the monitors work great but this.

These are excelent high quality cables an as everyone has said that with HDMI cables there is not so much diffrence between a budget cable to an overpriced "Premium Cable". They are just riding the waves from the days of Analoug cables actucally making a diffrence when you went with a more premium choice or with speaker cables which also make a diffrence because of the resistance does affect the sound quality. With digital signals if its rated/certified with the current or beyond standard is all that matters which means that all those ones and zeros make it to the other end.
I bought this a spare monitor cable about 7 months about. I have used it for  Xbox X, Computer, and even hooking up a VCR using a HDMI converter, every time it works with out issues!

would not work with my macbook.  I have the adaptor and i had this setup previously so i know nothing is wrong with my tv or macbook adaptor.  It will turn my tv off as soon as i plug it in.  I think I may have been sold a bad cable because that never happened with my previous hdmi chord

I was having trouble connecting standard HD devices to my new UHD TV, but the old cables for the devices would no longer work. These cables work fine. My BD player now works perfectly, but I don't have any UHD devices, so I can't comment on that.

What I like, compact, easy to setup, in most part plays videos smoothly. What disappoints, It claims to play M4V format, it does not.  So right off the bat, the one series I wanted to watch every file is M4V. These files paly excellent using my pc and VLC player.  They need to try to fix this.

Excellent price- went in to Best Buy Walmart and other bog box folks- they wanted 2 and 3x the price for the same item. We have purchased several Amazon Basic items for our home offices and have always been extremely pleased with the quality. For the same item BB wanted $29. Buy the Amazon Basics items- they offer the same if not improved performance and quality for 1/2 to 1/3 the price.
It’s constantly having connection issues even though it’s all the way plugged in the TV can’t read my device I have to unplug it and plug it back in for it to get signal.

As another reviewer wrote, it works fine with a 4K TV... so long as you aren't trying to send a 4K signal to your 4K TV.  I have a six foot cable and any 4K content has pretty bad audio crackling.  Lower res content has been fine, but I chose this based on its (false) claim of 4K support.

I didn't order this but I received anyway.I looked back through and found the order was placed on the 20th but it wasn't me. I ordered a different one, different length but was delivered over 2 wks ago.
I really needed a longer cord for connecting my computer to the TV and this works perfectly! The picture quality is wonderful and the cord seems very durable. Worth the money!

Six feet of wonderful.  I have several Amazon Basic cables in different configurations and lengths.  I do not hesitate to purchase Amazon Basic cables based on price where cheaper must not be as good. These are all certified cables and work (connection, signal, bandwidth) flawlessly.Highly recommended and would purchase again.  I am using this cable to connect HDMI out of a laptop to an Asus 24 inch monitor HDMI input, looks fantastic.

This 2-pack short HDMI cables work great with my streaming system. I am hiding all my cables behind my TV and the cables are short enough that I don't have to worry about how to deal with the redundant lengths. Great value. Buy it.

For those of you worried by reviews that says this cable doesn't support Ultra HD 4K - ignore those reviews. Because this cable works fine for that purpose. Those people probably just connected to a port that doesn't support 60HZ 4K. My TV only has one of those ports, and I was initially connected to a port that didn't support 4K. Then I read the TV manual, and I fixed the problem. No new cables needed.
I bought this cable to see if I could connect my laptop to my flat screen tv on the other side of the room.  It worked great. No problem with picture or sound. Connection was easy!

It works, and at time of purchase was the least expensive HDMI cable on Amazon. It isn't the most robust feeling cable I've bought, but at least it was inexpensive, hopefully it lasts as long as I need it to.

When an hdmi chord tells you which is the tv end and which is the source end you gotta love it. I snake this beast from a stage to the DJ booth — I run karaoke — and the signal is crystal. The wire can snake along with easy, and it babysits on date nights.

I was needing a short cable to run from my pc/console to a tv and this did it. Nice little bonus was I found out it could transmit internet through it as well (provided the tv was a smart tv and the output device was capable of sending ethernet over hdmi).

There's not much to be said about that that hasn't already been said.  Like all things Amazon Basics, it simply works.  The cord transmits signal both ways and is exactly what i was looking for.  So lets summarize:  This cord is HTMI, it works as planned and I'd buy it again nest time i need one.

Great item from Amazon here. If you're looking for HDMI cables I would suggest this. Don't listen to buzz words from cables that cost a lot more. These can handle any kind of content no matter what it is. From the lowest to the highest, including 4K or 3D. So if you spend more for cables than you got ripped off. These are all you need. I use these on a Apple 4K TV and the new Fire Cube 4K and they are amazing. Also can be used for gaming on any high powered machine.

Used this cable to hook up my computer to a TV. Worked great at first. After 3 weeks started getting blue screen on computer and of course the TV. Spent hours trying to figure out the problem. Then both the TV and Computer failed to recognize the HDMI connection. Purchased another cable from Walmart. Took care of Blue Screen and connection problem.

I use them to connect my Samsung UBD-KM85C 4K player to my Denon AVR-X3400H and the other to my Vizio M65-D0. No issues after a few months of watching lots of movies and streaming from a 4K fire stick.

I'm so happy I bought my HDMI cable off of amazon. They were so expensive at other stores, and I really wanted one at least 10-15 feet long. I bet this works just as well as any $40-$50 cable from target or wal-mart. Save some money and buy this from amazon! I've had no problems with it whatsoever.

I use this to connect my laptop to my monitor when i work from home (4/5 days). I've been using it a while now, and zero issues,no degradation in the cord or connection quality. I would recommend this.

Had to buy these for Sony DVD & blue -ray that don't just decided " Hey let's leave this out & name them HDMI cable so they can run around & find them! Can't believe they didn't come with Blue Ray. What are u gonna do for an Encore? Leave out plug?
Plugged it in and worked like a champ. On an iMac with an external monitor (4K TV). Works great.
Works as it should. Don't have no issues. Works with my monitor to my external GPU with no issues. Amazon continues to make amazing dependable products. I would recommend this to anyone.

Great HDMI cables for home entertainment system.  I use the shorter cables to attach to an HDMI switch because it keeps behind the entertainment system cleaner with less cord clutter and It allows for more devices I can plug into my TVs few HDMI slots.

Dont buy 100 ft unless dont plan on moving things a lot I find the 100ft i got a while back to be pretty bad and touchy but these i got a few packs 10ft. Pretty cheap and they're great! I use to pay $20 for decent ones in the past. (Singles)
Overall works perfectly and transmits signal without any loss or issues.  Feels like a decent quality HDMI cable for the cost as well.  Couldn't be happier with this purchase so far.
This cable did not work well for us. The picture quality was poor compared to our other HDMI cables. Chose to return it. Amazon made the return process painless.

What else can you expect except perfection and these cables gave me that. I not only find Amazon cables and products meeting all my expectations but are reasonably priced as well. Nothing more needs to be said.

The twin pack was the perfect fit for connecting my Blu-Ray and Roku to my widescreen without any signal loss and the extra length will come in handy when I relocate both. Heavy duty cable with molded connectors will undoubtedly hold up. Cables came with plastic covers installed on each connector end for protection and integrity. A great value for a high quality product, purchase with confidence!
These went into a hidden, behind the wall, location to connect a TV to a receiver and other components. They installed perfectly and are now working as expected.

I bought this because I occasionally enjoy streaming content on my computer to the tv in my bedroom. This guy is awesome quality and the length allows me to lay in bed with my computer instead of having to get up to access it while it’s connected to the tv. Product Approved! :)
These are basic relatively expensive cables.Pros:

Great cables, no issues. They're actually a significant improvement over AmazonBasics' older HDMI cables because the plastic sleeves on those were too rigid. These are much easier to work with.It's worth noting that I had to switch the HDMI mode from Auto to HDMI 2.0 in my TCL 55S405 TV to get HDR to work with the PS4.

Bought as a replacement PS4 cable..Within a month picture would glitch like a flash through intense gameplay like vibrant colors or fast movement ..(death stranding)....Works good with PC to computer and outputs n 4k...but if you buy this for PS4... Think again

These HDMI cables probably would have worked but I'll never know because the Amazon driver abandoned the package on the front door and it was stolen. For the job needed, it didn't do what I expected. If you are buying this for multiple screens for your PC, this works great. There really isn’t much to say about these cables. I have been using them for years and they work fine. They are pretty thick but still flexible. Would buy again.
Only one of three of these cables in the three pack was able to handle 4K/60 with HDR10. The others failed to handle it. Verified using a single cable between my Xbox and my receiver.

Back when I first bought a tv that used HDMI cables, I think I bought some at the same big box store I bought the TV and they were 30 dollars.  The Amazon Basic cables are much less and I've had no problems with them.  They work great in a 3D Tv that I own as well.

My prior cable seemed to cut out every now and then, which was annoying because my monitor would go to sleep and I'd have to wake it up again. This cable had shown no problems and shorter was better for my application.
There just ins't much to say about these.  They just work.  I bought it feed PC video to a nearby TV, and it works perfectly well for that, even up to the TV's max 4k/24fps ability.
These cables are serious!  Looks like you can use it to swing from one tree to the next like Tarzan would, it’s that beefy. Not the most manageable but for my specific application it’s perfect.

I strictly looked up great HDMI cords that could be used for a new 4K LED HDTV and two articles pointed towards this cord. Since there were hundreds of 5 star reviews, and the cord was 8$, i decided to pull the trigger. As far as I can tell, cord works great!

We had an older Roku that has been recycled to an older tv when I got my Samsung "smart" tv. The Samsung will not stream most of what we try to watch. I thought it was my wifi. We have had tech people out and have done everything to make that better. I decided to buy Roku 3. It came today my grandchildren just watched an entire movie on it  with not 1 problem.  I will have a Roku from now on. It's way better.

No complaints, works as a HDMI cable should. Picture quality seems great and price point is right. AmazonBasics put out great quality basic products for the price. I used to sell HDTV's back in 2006, this was during the first few years of plasma and LCD tv's, as well as the beginning of HDMI cables. We used to sell HDMI cables for $150+ each. I am not kidding you.Thankfully those prices came down and now if you need an HDMI cable, you can just buy this one.

Finally have a player and TV that I can connect directly with an HDMI cable. So much easier, and a better connection! Was pleased to see the gold plating on these connectors, a sign of quality. The audio output on my player always had a problem that it wouldn't work directly through my old or my new TV, so I had to route the sound through my stereo. The HDMI cable gives me perfect picture and sound.
Nice quality cables. Work great. 4K UHD HDR.Using the cables to connect 4K AppleTV and PS4 to to my Samsung 4K UHD HDR smart television. No problems running at the highest required bandwidths.
Don't waste your money on the HDMI cables in stores. These work just as good, and are much cheaper.
AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable, 6 Feet Cable allows me to share an Internet connection among multiple devices without the need for a separate Ethernet cable.

They work like any other cable. They are not exceptional, but they also are not cheaply made, they are about average in quality. Run of the mill like you might buy at WalMart. I give 5 stars because they do what I expected them to do, and I'd buy them again for the same or lessor price.

These cables worked out rather well.  Construction seems solid enough.  Picture/video quality is great so far for up to 1080p.  I haven't tried 2k/4k yet as I need to upgrade my wi-fi router first, but I've heard these cables only get up to about 10Gbps speed vs the 18Gbps they're advertised as.

I can't really rate the picture quality that much since I don't have any 4K display to use this for. But I would say it works well with 2K and gets the job done. Seems sturdy and no connection issues or display problems on my part.
Working as an extension for my oculus. No problems so far.
Good HDMI cable. I bought the 15 ft long cable. Is super long. Will easily reach anything inside a bedroom size room. Works as it should. No connection problems.

Does the job. got for my husband to hook up our spare TV in one of the bedrooms. Not sure how hard it is to go wrong with a cord. Haven't heard any complaints from him. 4 stars because I don't know much about this realm of product.

Worked as advertised. No flaws. Also came in nice packaging. What do you want me to say? Its a high quality, low cost HDMI cable. Did exactly what I need it to do. Nothing more, nothing less. Honestly, some of these reviews are ridiculously long and pointless. Always the possibility of getting a bad cord, that exists everywhere, but mine has worked fine for me. No issues. Highly recommend.

These guys were as good as any other name brand.  A local major store wanted 70 dollars for a 10 foot HDMI (didn't even get to which brand it might have been).  My picture compares the AmazonBasics with an older name brand one I have to show that fit shouldn't be a concern.  My LCD TV has a very tight place in which to plug these and I was a little concerned.  It fit just right.
Accurate description. Great product.
Cables are the biggest scam in the AV industry, and it's great to find an affordable cable that does just want you need it to.  This cable performs perfectly.

Works with our Sharp TV just give. However, regardless of which input on our receiver the audio is choppy and the video gets teal vertical lines in the highlights. Receiver has 5 different inputs and this happens on every single one but ONLY with the Amazon basics cables - 50ft monoprice, WiiU, and 2 other HDMI cables not from Amazon work just fine in the receiver.
Very good quality and sturdy made cable.  The cheaper cables begin getting week but these I cannot see this happening with.  These a well made and very sturdy.

2x3' cables, works as expected. The picture and sound quality seem normal, and no more tangles of snaking 8' cables. They are a bit stiffer than some others, but not a problem for me. Maybe my cats will have a harder time chewing through these...
I used it for my Nintendo Switch, PS4 and Nintendo Wii U. No problems at all.

I used these to hook up a TV to my computer so that I could share my p0rn stash with my whole family! It worked beautifully and now they all force me to go to therapy to break the addiction! This might sound like a downside but my therapist is hot and plays video games, so it's all good. But yeah, these things work. That's about all there is to say. They rather do or they don't. And these ones do. Batteries Not Included.
This cable appears to be very good quality- if you don't mind a thick sheath.  Heavy duty.  Picture and sound were fine the first two years, but now picture just gets "snow" (video noise) at times.
Tv wasn’t working and figured it probably was a faulty hdmi cable. Decided to order this and it fixed my problem. Very good quality. Loved the extra length. Amazon really makes good stuff.
THIS IS A VERY STURDY HDMI CABLE THE LENGTH IS GREAT YOU LOSE NO SIGNAL OR PICTURE QUALITY BECAUSE OF THE LENGTH AND IT WILL MEET YOUR NEEDS FOR LONGER CABLE

I love these cables!  I needed to be able to share with my audience what is on my computer and these cables did it.  I tried a product that looked the same from a big box store but they did not work.  These are the right length for what I needed also.

This is the third amazon basic product I've bought and all of them have broke down after a few weeks. Don't waste your money. It's worth it in the long run to just buy name brand products unless you need a quick disposable cable for the night.
Excellent quality, having two works fantastic whether I need 6 or 12 ft lengths. I also purchased a female coupler for when I find using the two cables together for a longer reach.
This worked great for about 5 weeks. As soon as the return window closed, it stopped working. Will not transmit a signal to monitor anymore - just a dimly lit black screen now.

I tend to have reservations about generic brands because they have this stigma of just being copycats of any original company that was the first to innovate the product. Maybe I'm just a biased fan of Amazon, but I have no complaints about this product. It's an HDMI cable - not much to review. But I trust the AmazonBasics brand and found it to be a good value vs. unknown makers with dubious claims of quality. Thanks.
Don’t waste your money on high end names. They are cables and I’m sure amazon uses the same high end people or has a standard to make sure it’s equivalent or exceeds other cables
I bought a couple of the HDMI cables to use with various devices. They work great and out of all the options I shopped for this is the best value for your money.
These are being used through a splitter to have one monitor alternately used for 2 laptops. Even going through the splitter they work perfectly.  Additionally the lifetime warranty is reassuring.
For HDMI 2.0/HDCP 2.2 support on 4k devices at this price and quality, you can't beat it. I get excellent HDMI and Dolby Vision picture with this. No need for those expensive other brands.

Great HDMI cable if you need to go a long way. Very well made with sturdy hard cased ends. I needed to go through and behind a wall in several twist and turns to connect a TV outdoors and this cable made the trip without any damage.

The cord was much heavier than I expected.  It is very thick which I guess is extra shielding or insulation.  It should last a long time.  I use it almost every day and it even gets stepped on repeatedly and have had no problems with excellent picture quality.
Got this 25 foot long high speed HDMI cable to connect my HTPC to my 1080p projector. Works very well as expected. Love AmazonBasics products and prices. Recommended!
Love the convenience of needing a HDMI cord and having it delievered two days later at a great price. These have been working far better than the $20 each ones we bought at the store

Great price, flawless product.  When I went to hook up my new sound bar to my new TV, I needed an HDMI cable that was ARC compatible.  Had no idea those $100 Monster cables I bought ten years ago would not work.  But these work great!

Used this for a 1080p projector and it’s able to handle a full rgb 60hz signal no problem. Feels very well built as the cable is very thick, so I used a cable saver at the projector end to preserve the projectors HDMI port and it made cable management easier.

I use this cable for my ARC connected sound bar.  But I am running the video through this cable, through the sound bar as well without any audio distortion and crystal clear video.  Good price, good cable.  Why not get it?

Very nice cable for a good price. Don't be fooled by the high priced "monstrosity" cables. Digital data doesn't care what the cable looks like or what the price is. It either works or it doesn't. These cables work great and are flexible. The plug ends could be smaller. A little tight fit into my hdmi switch but ok.

AmazonBasics' product are simply the best. The cables are thick, so I'd suppose the quality is good. And for the price, I couldn't have asked for anything more! These cables just work, unlike those cheap ones from eBay that requires some adjusting of the cable to get a signal. It's simply a Belkin quality HDMI cable that's priced at a generic cable's price!
I got the 15 foot cable.I ran this from my PC to the television, and the display was recognized.

Works great, the only thing to be aware of is the 15' cable is MUCH thicker than any of the shorter cables. I bought several of the 6' & 10' cables, they were all the same thickness and fairly flexible. The 15' cable is about twice as thick. It is thicker to accommodate the signal for the extra distance without degradation, but it is more difficult to work with if you need tight corners.

I gotta say these cords are not below any standards that are humanely noticeable. I bought them to keep in stock in case I need an extra or in case I buy something new and need a HDMI cord. But I can honestly say that after receiving them, I ended up replacing some name-brand cords that I bought from Walmart because apparently they were out of date and they just felt flimsy in general. I'm using one right now and have a perfect picture and perfect sound. Why buy anything else?
Purchased this product to replace a more frilly cable connection to TV that failed in under two years. Current cable works fine, but, TV conn is listed at 30 Hz. Trying to work out why. More later.
You get more than enough for what you pay.  Not a bad cable, but obviously there's better. One good bump into the plug end will bend it and almost certainly make it not work.

I don’t have any way of measuring speed’s, transfer quality, or anything technical like that, but they seem to be doing exactly what they’re supposed to.  I purchased several more of these and replaced all my older cables.  Now I’m getting 4K!

I am using this for my projector and this cable is awesome! I was really surprised on how thick the cable is compared to other brands you purchase at local stores. Quality wise it is working as expected with no glitches whatsoever. For the price, length and cable thicknes/quality you can't beat this price. Definitely recommend this. If I knew how to post pictures I'd share a few so you can see the quality.
Great affordable HDMI cable. We use these for all 20 employees in our office and no-one has complained about them for over a year. They work well for video and audio. High quality cables.

These are great quality HDMI cables for a fraction of the price Best Buy charges. These are not cheap knockoffs, Amazon makes excellent "store brand" products. I used these for my DVR and XBOX One. The picture works perfectly and the connection is nice and tight. I love how these are only 3 feet long and do not create a lot of wire clutter. I got this 2 pack for half the price 1 would have cost me at BB.....HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!

The cable is awesome! It allows me to run my laptop from my easy chair in the living room while using my 65 inch curved Samsung tv for its monitor. The cable is a lot bigger in diameter than what I saw at Bestbuy and a much better price.
I use this to connect my desktop to my TV to use it as a second screen. Great cord length and no picture or audio issues! (And yes, it sends both audio and video signals!)
No need fro expensive cables.  These work just as well at a fraction of the cost.  This is not rocket science folks, only wires.  Don't let those salesman talk you into $60 cables.
I've not noticed any difference in picture or anything. My Blurays look incredible still, even tho the HDMI is cheaper than some. I've had no issues and am happy so far.

ecause it worked fine after installation. However about 6 months, I started to observe issue that the video image blacked out intermittently. Great deal this chord is very thick I was actually surprised how good the quality was I purchased this in a quick pinch for a projector I needed the same day it comes in several legenths I bought 15ft and am very pleased with this product! *****

HDMI cord was nice quality and so convenient to pair with the Blu-ray player I purchased at the same time. Good deal and amazon is my go to for just about everything now!

Works great, I'm using an older LCD TV as a second monitor for my Home Studio and the clarity is beastly. The picture quality equals that of my high resolution computer screen.

You could attach this thing to a boat anchor. It's THICK. I wouldn't think twice about duct-taping it across the floor of an area with some traffic.This also means if you need to bend it in, around, and through stuff, it's gonna be clumsy.

Fair price and decent feeling quality.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of how thick and rigid it is.  It is literally 4 times the diameter of some other decent quality HDMI cables I have.  This one is so thick and inflexible that it barely fit in my wire raceway.

Many electronic products come with an HDMI cable, but sometimes they aren't long enough for your set-up situation. Having a longer cable is the solution. I've experienced no signal loss or distortion using this longer cable. Works as advertised.

As many reviews mention, this thing is thick and heavy which is okay with me. So far it works great. I use between my laptop and UHD TVs. Not much else to say other than that the price is fair and the product works as described. I use mine for my Playstation 4 particularly, but there should of course be no problems using it for anything else.

Good size for connecting devices on a TV stand.  Most other cables are 5 feet and above and leave too much extra and clutter around.  These are the right size for the job! I recommend buying them in the 2 pack.

This cable does the job perfectly.  Thanks again, Amazon!

I just got this for my 19 inches flat TV I connected to my DVD player and it works good last the picture quality looks good it looks better than when I had the 3 cables connected I recommend this cable ill be ordering one more for my Sony TV 32 and inches thanks for the fast delivery

GOOD QUALITY AND OUTSTANDING PRICE. ONCE I BOUGHT ONE OF THIS  HIGH - SPEED  HDMI CABLE IN EBAY AND THE QUALITY WAS SO POOR THAT I THROW IT IN THE GARBAGE, BUT THIS CABLE IS SUPERIOR QUALITY.I HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.THAT'S ONE OF THE REASON I BUY FROM AMAZON'S, THE QUALITY ARE SUPERIOR  AND  BETTER PRICE.

Handles 4K HDR from Xbox One S perfectly. Continually flickers in/out with PS4 Pro only when attempting to use the highest video output setting or the auto setting (since that recognizes my tv as capable of handling 4K HDR). Used the cable that came with PS4 Pro instead and it works perfectly. To be fair, it can just be a single defective amazon basics cable or it can be the total run (from PS4 to receiver and then receiver to TV (note: diff brand cable for the 2nd leg of the run that is 15ft and certified for 18gbps)) being shortened by using the shorter cable that came with the PS4 Pro that allows that combined run to be successful. The 4 star rating is because the cable works as advertised with Ultra Blu-ray movies with HDR being output from the Xbox One S at the same run length. It's also a great 4K cable in general as I use it with plenty other devices that don't require as much bandwidth. My current entertainment center setup doesn't lend itself to easy cable swapping and testing of various scenarios so I'm sorry I can't rule more out but I wanted to provide some level of warning for those of you have a similar setup: PS4 Pro to 4K HDR capable receiver to 4K HDR capable TV.

I purchased this cable for my Xbox and since I purchased it the issues with my TV loosing the signal from my Xbox have stopped.  The cable looks to be good quality and fits nice and tight in the HDMI slots.  Would recommend this to anyone in need of a new HDMI cable!
This cable was crap. Worked for a few months and then would cut out the picture on my tv every few minutes. Waste of money and disappointed there’s no warranty for a defective product.
I needed patch cables for the various things in my home theater receiver shelf. Didn't need anything super high bandwidth and these did the trick.

This HDMI cable was much thicker than I was expecting compared to the other HDMI cables I have connected to my TV.  Seems to be pretty good quality.  No issues with it after several months of pretty light use.
When it comes to HDMI cables either it works or it doesn't. Beyond that it's just a matter of cost. This cable works great and it's cheap. Buy it.

Good quality cables. I use them to watch videos from my laptop on my TV. Sends video and audio to TV.All HDMI cables are pretty much the same. Save money by going with these cables instead of the super expensive "name branded" cables. Spending money on higher end cables really doesn't make much difference in quality.
As countless others have states, this is the best 4K HDR HDMI cable for the price. Bought these after Monoprice HDMI cable failed. This Amazon HDMI cable has a lifetime warranty. Buy it.
Works as described and very well made.  Cable is the thickest HDMI I've ever seen, definitely well shielded.  Perfect length and no issues so far

Needed extra long cable to run for my multimedia server.  Running cables to fit cable management products or inside walls  takes a lot of right angles which means more cable to get from point A to point B.
It does what it is supposed to. This is a thick wire, just as an fyi. I was surprised. I just didn't know enough about these wires I guess. lol.

I bought this Amazon Basics HDMI cord about 5 months ago to connect monitor to my laptop for school work. Everything was going fine until a few days ago, when my monitor started having issues with connecting. I have determined my monitor is not the problem, but the cord. Now I'm stuck in COVID-19 quarantine without a working monitor to do work and school from home. My advice is to spend the extra and buy a nicer HDMI cord.

There is very little to judge a cable's performance on.  It either works, or it does not. As with all AmazonBasics cables I have ordered over the years, I had the utmost confidence in this cable performing, and it did not disappoint.  You cannot beat the outstanding value of these cables.
I once thought you could never have too many HDMI cables. I was wrong but at least I'll never run out of them. No issues. Product as expected. I recommend this product.
This is a great HDMI cable. I use it for presentations at work and was completely satisfied with it's performance. It is also sleek and durable.

Over the years, I've purchased a large number of peripherals for my computer system. This HDMI cable is just one in a long line! I purchased this recently, after buying a new 55-inch UHD television. A friend of mine (who works in home theater installation) noticed on the back of the television that, unlike my previous television, there wasn't a VGA input (my tower is an older model, which has a VGA output). After doing some research on another computer, he found out that there were converters that would switch VGA to HDMI, allowing older computer models to be used with newer televisions. I purchased both this converter, and this cable, to fix the problem.One thing my friend noted while installing this converter was just how easy it was to set up. All you have to do is connect the VGA plug into the back of your older model computer, connect the box to your TV through an HDMI cable, and off you go! Actually, you also have to connect the 3.5mm jack into the audio output on your computer and power the whole thing through an empty USB slot. The great thing about this is the fact that it will work not only on Windows, but on Macintosh, as well.

Ever want to set up a webcam in a different location than in your face? Want a webcam in an out-of-the-way location so as not to ruin an event? This is one of the best ways to do all that. Doing wedding streaming isn't about me being seen, but the bride and groom. I can get that perfect angle without being in the scene with this. HDMI is digital. 1s and 0s, not analog waves. You either get a full signal or nothing at all. There is no reason whatsoever to buy anything more expensive, at least with a cable this short.If you're doing a 50 foot run, on the other hand, maybe look for an "active" cable that boosts the signal in long/thin cables. The point is though, those MAINTAIN the signal. No cable will ever improve the signal beyond what your source is producing. So save your money and buy this.
I had just purchased a new Blue-ray/DVD player and discovered I needed an HDMI cord. Found this product quickly and it arrived in a reasonable amout of time and I enjoy the quality video signal.
