It works fine as an HDMI cable. It's probably not the best cable out there but it works.You could spend a lot more money on a crazily over the top HDMI cable (like https://smile.amazon.com/AudioQuest-Diamond-feet-Braided-Cable/dp/B003CT08E4/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1482340003&sr=8-1&keywords=expensive+hdmi+cable this one) but for 99.999% of people this one will work without any problems whatsoever.

There is nothing special about this cable at all, but it works just fine as advertised. It's an HDMI cable that comes in various lengths and has good connection quality. If you need a reliable HDMI cable, this cable will do the job. No complaints here.

Either the cable was defective or the product description is inaccurate. Doesn't work with FireTV. Labeled HDMI whereas another AmazonBasics cable I already had that works is labeled HDMI and Ethernet.
Pros: does everything you need from a HDMI cable, good length, reliable, good connection, more affordable than some of the brand-name optionsCon: none at this time
I just needed one to replace the old one running between the Roku and t.v..  It works great.  No more issues.  T.v. is 1080p.

HDMI is digital, not analog, so you don't need $30 3' cables to get good connections.  As long as all the pins are connected, the cable works.  Avoid the old trap of buying big brand name "special" cables and get something cheap like these that work just as well.
Watch our for your hdmi ports on this one. The cable is incredibly heavy and bulky. One wrong move and you are going to shred your hdmi port. Would not buy again. Too heavy//bulky.

Not much to say about this HDMI cable. It works properly, seems to be of decent build quality, and was very affordable. Have yet to notice any issues with picture quality/performance.I recommend this product, given the price-point.

Very quick setup and easy to use. Starts up much faster than my PlayStation, and downloading apps is a breeze. Seems to load my shows much quicker as well. Smaller than I expected, about the size of a 5x7 photo album. I love that it uses a Bluetooth connection that doesn't require line-of-sight to the remote, so you can place it behind your TV or other devices to save shelf space.
Amazon has definitely improved when it comes to their branded products. This product has never failed me and i have bought a few of them! Would recommend!
Works fine at 4k 60hz.  Cable is pretty thick but I'd expect that with a 25 ft cable.  The thicker wires reduce the signal loss.

I have the following run without a repeater and it works flawlessly with 4K 60Hz HDR (no static/breaks, etc) on all input sources (including PS4).Denon AVR-6500H -> 25 ft Amazon HDMI -> Amazon HDMI Coupler -> 25 ft Amazon HDMI -> Optoma UHD60 4K Projector

After having some issues with our tv going in and out with an old hdmi cable we were worried that it could have been the port and not just the cord. We decided to buy this because the price was perfect as a test for the port. We have been pleasantly surprised! It works way better than our old one and have had no issues!
The product is good. it is a little difficult to bend but easy to use. The picture quality was not what I looking for but not that bad either.
Very nicely made cable works great the only con is it's at least 3/8 thick!!  if I would have known how sick and unmanageable it was I would have never ordered it.

Needed this to connect to a splitter so I could stop having to plug and unplug cables to my TV and projector (which is connected with a 25ft HDMI cord).It's now connected to a powered splitter (had to have a powered one for the 25 ft. cord), so no more reaching into the back to try to find the plug.

I bought this cord solely based on price and length - to hook to my Nintendo NES Classic (Because the Classic comes with like a 3' cable and my TV is mounted to the wall). It does the job - but it is a BEEFY cable. Like it is the thickest HDMI cable I have ever seen. It kind of manhandles my little Nintendo, but it does the job (kind of overkill for my needs, but it works, so whatever).

Purchased this long version of HDMI to connect laptop computer that had a screen issue to our smaller TV.  Computer connected immediately and the picture quality was great, so no issues so far.  I cannot comment on higher end usage since I am only using for light use.
I like this product. I've had terrible experiences with previous purchases through other sellers but this one gets the job done.

These are the typical high quality type products I always get with Amazon Basics.  These HDMI cables are very fairly priced and seem to be constructed of high quality materials.  The ends fit snugly in the ports and everything seems to work just as they should.
Nothing exciting, it’s just a cable. This gets plugged/unplugged and coiled daily. Several months and no signs of cracking or breaking.

Amazon Basics are always the way to go. They have always produced quality products for me whether its an iPhone charger, rechargeable batteries, camera case along with many more or something like this. Happy with this purchase and will continue to buy Amazon basics whenever available.

Works well, and price is right. The only minus is that this is absolutely the thickest hdmi cable I've ever seen in my life. It's closer to a heavy duty extension cord.  Thickness could cause a problem if grouped with other wires and passed through a small hole- like through a countertop or in a media center.
This cable was plugged in a year ago in an application where there is no movement of the cable.  In one year it stopped working.  Disconnecting and reconnecting did not revive it.
I have a Roku Premier+ and get random errors related to HDCP with my older hdmi cablesI had a high quality 3ft cable and it works fine with that - but I needed a 6 foot cable so I purchased these

Cable worked fine until the TV ARC function of my Samsung soundbar failed. I am not the first one to have that trouble with Samsung soundbars. I'm using digital optical now with the soundbar which really isn't bad. So now I have a spare HDMI cable that I won't hesitate to use again.

This thing is a beast! It's nearly 7/16" thick. The only negative I have is that due to it's thickness, on my one tv, the way in which the HDMI ports are positioned, I really had to work the cable into the port. Length is great though. Now I can have my MacBook resting safely on my nightstand and have the cable routed to it so I can watch media from it while in bed.
HDMI cable is 10 ft long and it works great. I was able to connect my PlayStation and a much further distance because of it.
Perfectly fine item. Just be aware the cable is much larger in diameter (3/8") than is typical. Could be problematic if cable run or hole space is limited.
I trust AmazonBasics, and this HDMI cable is no exception. Works as it should, and paid a great price. I use it with a Lightning/HDMI dongle to broadcast my iPhone to my TV.

Ok I've not had it for long at all and the one end fell apart. Really surprised with the quality, normally amazon products are much better than that. The metal prongs that plug into the tv fell apart.
Happy with the cables; but I habe a very basic TV & I don't do any heavy streaming or gaming so if anything happens I'll update this review.

Very impressed with the construction of this HDMI cable.  I was suckered into buying Monster brand in the past - what a waste of money! I am using the AmazonBasics to run in-wall through a conduit and I have not had any problems.  Best thing is I ordered two cables and decided I did not need one and Amazon refunded the purchase price AND let me keep the cable. Awesome!

This HDMI cable paired with the Apple Lightning to Digital AV Adapter has made it possible for me to stream TV shows and movies from my phone to TV (not a smart TV). I don’t have Wi-Fi, I use my unlimited data on my iPhone 7 Plus and subscriptions (Hulu, Netflix, etc.) to watch TV and movies. Now, I can do so on a bigger screen and I didn’t need a Fire stick or similar gadget to do so.

I bought it for my UHD Samsung 55 inch TV, the 4 K video streaming is not up to the mark and still I can see the flickering happening other normal videos are fine when we connect this. Even though is high speed cable it didn't met my requirement but I'm not sure that my laptop too has got some things needs to fixed or is it capable of sending the 4k video through HDMI output.

I have been using this product for more than couple of months and still I didn't lost any connection due to this product.  The protecting cables are very well. No rust formation is noticed. But I think they are a little bit expensive compare to the other products of the same class.

These HDMI cables work just fine. No need to spend exorbitant amounts on HDMI cables. Since it is a digital signal, the picture quality will be the same regardless of the cable used. Cable quality is more of a concern for older analog connections.
Bought these because they were cheap and didn’t have any major expectations. They arrived quickly and I was surprised they’re so well made and durable.
I've had this cable for 6+ months now, has worked perfectly with no issues (used for connecting ps4 to tv). Appears to be durable and at 6ft can reach just about anywhere you could possibly need.
Great buy. Great quality can’t beat the price. We used this to hook our desktop up to our 4K tv not sure how it would work. Perfect picture, no delay. Such a good price.
Just a really good cord. Have used it constantly for a couple years and its still holding up. No issues and I’ll probably buy more of these as I need them.
I love amazon basics! They are usually reasonable priced with reliable quality. Hope amazon basics can make more good quality electronics with cheap price.
didn't notice ant difference between this cable and the other cables that I have. can't sat the same for another Item that was on this order

I ordered a pile of these amazon basic cables a few years back and finally started to run out of them (most were given away to friends who didn't realize they needed an HDMI cable for a new gizmo).  So I ordered more recently and continue to find the newer ones work just as well and honor the newer HDMI standards, to boot.
I needed this for my HDMI remote so I could attach three other items to my 55" TV.  The cable was well made and works great.

Best value on HDMI cables. I've used expensive monster cables, cheap knockoffs, and these AmazonBasics. You can absolutely tell the difference between high and low quality cords, and these AmazonBasics work as well as the expensive cables I've used. These are the only ones I use now, great value, better quality.
so I bought this to hook up my MacBook to my projector, and it works just as expected, it is durable and doesn't seem like it would break too easily, I am happy with my purchase.

Just the right size for Apple TV to Smart TV so there is not extra cable hanging around.  Picture and sound are great, so I would say cable is flawless, at least in the short term, as I have used only a couple weeks.

These are decent, inexpensive HDMI cables that are more flexible than many I have had. The flexibility of these is especially appreciated as I used these to replace some very stiff and rigid cables that were hard to position and because of that appeared to stress connections. These Amazon cable are more flexible and performance has been the same.
It’s a really good cable very thick, great quality. I needed it to stream 4K videos and movies from my pc to my tv and now it works great no blurry screen no sound lag it’s perfect!

Wow, this is the first cable @ 25 feet long I have found that can actually do 4k at 60hz!!! After trying out half a dozen others all of them are labeled incorrectly.. Here you have a "generic" cable that out performs every other cable on the market... Get this one!!!! Seriously, this is the one you want..
This cord is ridiculously thick. Like almost the circumference of a dime thick. It works though, can't complain with that.
Could have used a shorter able, but they were out of stock.  Still, this was reasonably priced and was just what I needed.
Works well so far. This is my second order of these to convert DispalyPort using active adapter / converter to HDMI for TV.
I needed a 6 ft cable for my tv. This works and does a great job. It feels like it was made from higher quality material than others i have bought.

these cables work great. I tried some more expensive cables and they didn't even work. you can't go wrong with Amazon Basics. you can pay much more for other cables but you won't get any better cable.
this product is ideal for the PS4 Pro if you buy cheap HDMI Cables the system will reject them. so this does the job and its actually really great in quality vs the one i had before from BestBuy.
No hate towards Amazon basics, but these did not work for me. I don't know why, but I purchased different cables and have been using those.

I have said it a few times but Amazon Basic products are awesome! We never go wrong them and they are of superior quality! We bought this for use when we mounted our TV. When you see anything that says Amazon basics you can rest assured you will get a great product!

Excellent! It works great!! I was reluctant at first because it's 25“long, but when I connected it from my Laptop to TV, I was so happy because the TV screen was so clear, even better than my Laptop screen. Pleased with this product

This cable worked fine for 2 years, no complaints. However, after 2 years the cable quit working. Perhaps a 2 year year life span at this price point is okay. Just beware that this cable may not as long as you might expect.

Signal started to become intermittent after about a year.  Initially thought it was Roku or its apps or the HDMI port, but it is definitely the cable.  The cable is used for a TV, so it never moves.  Did I fry it with the weird or boring stuff I watch?

Unfortunately, I have determined that these cables will not pass a surround sound signal to my Pioneer SC-71.  Input sound is shown as stereo only.  I then had to have the Pioneer upscale to surround.  No clue as to why but when I replaced with my old HDMI cable the 5.1 signal "magically appeared" again.  I was hoping that since these are the latest HDMI compliant and I am not 4K they would be fine.  No such luck.

I had one between my pc and TV and the second from my android box. One died, and now the second died in the same week. Product comes with a "limited lifetime warranty" from Amazon... if only you can figure out how to actually initiate and send in a warranty replacement.
Erratic and goes bad fast.I ordered a straight hdmi for my monitor and it works fine.

I’ve had this product for 3 months and the remote no longer works.  I’m so disappointed and disgusted with this - trying to fix it means I have to go to support and then go through layer after layer after layer after layer (get the point?) to figure it out.  And it still doesn’t work.  So I no longer have access to amazon prime video  (which is why I bought it in the first place) so I may cancel prime  and just go back to cable.  ☹️
I got this because my Roku didn't want to work with the HDMI cable it came with. Something about "unauthorized HDCP content". This cable resolved that problem.

The splitter is plugged into our Prism DVR-STB  HDMI jack and connected to our primary TV with a 3-foot HDMI cable and to our home office TV via the 25-foot AmazonBasics High Speed HDMI cable.  Both TVs work perfectly with this arrangement.  Of course we are limited to the same channel on each TV, but that is ok with us.  The combo purchase cost was recovered with about four months of not paying an additional STB fee.
Two quick notes:1. With my Apple TV 4K, these cables work perfectly and support all 4K / HDR features.
It's 25 feet of HDMI cord. I don't remember what convinced me to get a cord this long but it works just as well as any other HDMI cord i've ever had.
Works great 4K with ethernet can't beat it don't pay for the name brand I bought Monster Cables picture and sound as identical
Seem to all work very well. Keep these as extras in my computer bag so they get wound up and unwound often. No problems yet.
This is a functional quality cable that seems durable. I would prefer a softer one since I use it to connect a laptop with an external monitor, but otherwise perfect.
Works great. Works well with my LG v20 phone. It's a bit bulky running from my TV to my phone. But it sure as hell beats paying all the high cable fees.

This cable works just fine and it is well made. I have many Amazon Basics cables and have never experienced a failure.

This is an excellent product it exceeded my expectations cuz it was so inexpensive it arrived early and works well I'd like to also add that I was given absolutely nothing for my interview I spent my hard-earned money on the product and I would do it again as I recommend it as well

Other have had problems with their cables, but I've order three sets (9 cables total) and they all have worked flawlessly.  I use them for my home theater as well as by computers, and neither have seen any issues.  I'm waiting for Amazon to come out with HDMI 2.1 cables so I can start buying those.
It’s what I expected to receive. I have heard no complaints from the users so I’m going to say they work as expected.
i wish this cable's thickness was more clearly stated in the add, seeing as how thick this cord is, its not somthing you could use with a laptop on a couch with how little give the cord has
YU CAN BUY MORE EXPENSIVE ONES BUT THESE WILL BE JUST AS GOOD  THEY ARE FOR ME, EVEN WENT AND BOUGHT ANOTHER TO HOOK UP SOUNDBAR,

So far so good.  This cable is being used in multiple places without any issues.  Quality of the Picture and speed of data transmission is great.  The quality of the cable is better than other brands I have used in the past.
Did not work for 4K hdcp with Roku Ultra and LG TV. Replaced with Atevon cable, works great. Won’t be buying these anymore.
I am grateful for these affordable products from “amazon basics.”  I’m so sick of spending $20 or more for basic stuff like this.  Using it to connect my Roku device to my TV and it works perfectly.

I swapped out my Black Web high-speed HDMI with these and i stopped having flickering issues. It also has a quicker response when the type of signal changes back and forth (4k blu-rays do this when watching the movie or watching a special feature on that disc).
Bought because it's always good to have an extra HDMI cable on hand. Audio and picture quality are great. Would recommend.
This cord works as expected arrives on time and hasn’t given us any problems I would recommend this product to anyone else

I had one of these fail on me. Connected DVD player to TV. Light duty use, no reason for it to fail but it did. I ordered this one to replace it, mostly because they are so inexpensive. So far so good. Hopefully it was a fluke.
Pretty good quality cables for the price and the picture quality is as good as the more expensive cables. Why pay more? These do the trick.
I have never had a single issue with these cables.  AmazonBasics relabel brand seems to do a good job of picking quality partners to work with.
Didn't really notice any special changes to the program timing ! I don't think buying these cables made a difference!

Thick, heavy cable - about 3/8" diameter provides very clean signal to my plasma TV.  I am impressed with the cable quality and the ruggedness of its connectors.  Razor-sharp images.  You won't find better for anywhere near this price - maybe not at any price.  As a decades-long audio/video enthusiast, I've used a great number of various cables.  I'll be using more AmazonBasics cabling if this is representative of the line.

Purchased a new 4K Samsung TV and forgot to 4K TVs need a new style HDMI cable. Best buy had them for well over $60. Decided to get one of these from Amazon for 4X less the price. Works great connecting from our DirectTV to our Smart TV.

I recently replaced a PC monitor and the new Monitor uses an HDMI input.  I did not have a long enough one so tried these out.  Work great and great price.  I have been pleased with all the Amazon Basic cables I have bought.
I needed three longer HDMI cables and this bundle did the trick. Now I've got a clean setup and the cables are doing what they're supposed to.
Thise HDMI cable does not work.I use the cable to connect my laptop to TV to see a movie. But the cable's bandwidth is too low to work.

Doesn't work with HDR on the playstation 4 PRO. It  does work with all other hdmi eqipment I have used it on.Works on the playstation 4 PRO if you turn off HDR. Had to buy more expensive HDMI cable to get it working on my pro
Works well, plugged right in, can't tell a difference between this and expensive brand name ones.  Definitely worth the money.

I got a couple of these in 6' and 10'. I needed something that would support 4k, HDR, Dolby Atmos, etc. After reading reviews I was worried they may not be able to handle it. Glad to say I was wrong.Setup:

It looks sturdy and it is great so far. I wanted to get 10ft cable so that it is long enough to connect my TV and the DVR as well as the Xbox. It supports all the functions. I do not have 4K console to test it out. But overall, it seems to be a great cable for the price

This is now the second Amazon Basics product that I have purchased that was clearly a returned item (that's how it came out of the package; seal broken and a rat's nest in the box), which sucks because now I have no idea if there is something wrong with it or it's even the same product. Well, shame on me for not learning the last time. Never again.

There is no need to pay a lot of money for a hdmi cable. Cables costing a thousand dollars are no better than these cables right here. AmazonBasics makes it possible to purchase high quality cables at a very reasonable price backed by a lifetime warranty. The gold plated connectors are great. Throughput is excellent. What else can I say.

The cable is 3/8 inch in diameter about the same diameter as my heavy duty extension cord that I use for 15 amp power tools. It is horribly inflexible and a complete joke to attempt to use for electronics. I would give it a minus 5 if that were available.
Needed an HDMI cable to connect PC to TV monitor. It was easy to connect and works extremely well inn that environment.
This product worked for a few days.  Then the "item not supported" message popped up on my phone.  It stopped charging.
Had to buy one because I started working from home. Works great and is way better than the one my job provided me with!

Use an antenna to record some shows and video would keep blacking out or even quitting. Replaced with these cables and can now watch these just fine.  Now just have to get my son to put these in the wall & take out the old ones!

I tried 4k with this 25 ft cable from a PS4 Pro to a projector and a monitor, which work well with short cables.The cable simply doesn't work at all for 4k content, it even has some connection issues at 1080p, works well at 720p, it's not good at all. I have used these cables for my Apple TV, DVD player, and Fire TV and they work fine.  A good value for the money.  RJB.

This cable is as advertised.  I am using it to link my desktop monitor to the tower.  Lightening fast performance and excellent quality!  The price is fabulous! Even Walmart could not beat it!  I'd definitely recommend this!
These are good cables they're worth the money I have no complaints they're still working and I've had them for a while. I would recommend these they work very well.
I'll say it again and again. Amazon's cables are probably the best deal in their entire stock. Cheap and reliable while still having great build quality.

This HDMI cable is crazy long and very durable! The cord is very thick.. Maybe a quarter of an inch. If you definitely need something this long, go for it, but if not I would recommend a shorter cable that isn't so bulky and thick. Great product though!

These were bought to replace some old 1st generation Monster cords.  I recently upgraded to a 4K tv and new Yamaha receiver.  The TV was fine, but on fast movements, it was lagging.  I bought these new cords in hopes of being able to alleviate that issue.  It worked amazingly well and at such a wonderful price to boot.  I don't know why you'd buy any HDMI cable other than these AmazonBasics.

This is my 2nd one bought.  I didn't have any problems with the first one but the one I recently bought has a short in it.  I'm constantly having to jiggle the cord to get it to work and ya don't dare touch it after you get it to working.

Price beats any store around. Thank you Amazon for that and the length was exactly what I was looking for really. The TV is on the oldish side so not expecting a word to add any new age sound and image...it was just the length I needed.
Solid. Has lasted for a few years no complaints.

There was time when all the cables I bought had to be Monster but as I got wiser switched to Monoprice but now am a fan of the Amazon Basics cables. These are built to the latest hdmi spec and support ARC. Unless you have a niche set up or an urge to get a name brand cable you can’t go wrong with these cables.
I needed a good quality cable to connect my Blu Ray played to my tv. This surely did the trick and am very happy with it!

This HDMI cable does everything that I needed it for. I went to Bestbuy to try to buy one and they were all priced at $25-$50. I bought the 10 foot cable for less than $10. I've tried it on my 42 inch plasma (720p resolution) and my 50 inch LED (1080p resolution), they both looked great, the sound was clear, and I didn't have any problems with it at all. I love these so much that this is my second set of a 2 pack. They look clean and work great for a very reasonable price. Thank you Amazon.

Garbage. Both HDMI cables failed. They were replaced with better quality cables and the problems stopped. Avoid and buy a better quality cable. Its worth the money in the end.

i used it for a few months. as soon as my son noticed i had one he needed it for his gaming monitors. Works wonderful.

Pliable and easy to work through tight areas.  I formerly had a large sheathed cable that was difficult to manipulate and was also using a connector to add length, which probably weakened my signal, but I get a clear picture with this HDMI cable.

It's... well it's an HDMI cable, and it's got thick enough cable, with enough insulation, that you won't have any problems with any normal use. Grab these honestly, they're not that high on price. This is the way to go. I used to buy more pricey HDMI cables, and while those are nice and do a great job, this right here works just perfectly. All 3 came super fast, work right out of the box, and look great. There really is no greater value than these HDMI cables.

So many of these reviews on various products really don't make sense. I saw the reviews on these and was like I'm going to purchase them, couldn't be more happier with this purchase. Both cords are hooked up to my PS3 and ps4, on my TV and they show great picture quality!

TV sometimes pops up a weird HDMI error message when we use this particular cord that I've never seen with any other cord. We unplug and plug it back in and the message goes away and it works fine, so we keep using it, but, weird.
Used to hookup my Asus monitor to my Acer Chromebook 14. Works well I've had really good luck with Amazon Basics cables and other products.
For the record, there is no degradation with HDMI cables. It either works or it doesn't. Just buy whatever is the cheapest.
For the price, this Amazon branded cable seems to be of top notch quality.  It is competitively priced and will last a long time.

We have cats that like to sit behind the tv sometimes (I’m guessing because it’s warm), and we previously had cables that became undone fairly easily.. these have yet to come unplugged unintentionally.
These cables are way too thick and cumbersome.  Extremely rigid and do not conform to the necessary bend radius for use with televisions.  The bend radius is approximately 1 foot.

I bought these cables to connect my Fire TV, Cox Cable Box, and Samsung DVD player with my Samsung UN65KS8000 television. I must say so far so good. These cables do display the full 1080p output they are supposed to, and I have had no issue with the quality of picture I am receiving. The 3ft cable length is perfect for devices that are right next to the television, that way there is not too much cable clutter.
This is one Heck Of A cable and Value (BB cost 4 times what this did)SUPER Quality!  (Think VERY Thick!)

These little guys are awesome. They could stand to be a little more sticky for thing that have curved lights, but for anything flat,  these are amazing. Stop spending money on expensive cables. This one is AMAZING! And way cheaper here than at a store. Thanks to the seller and the fast delivery. :) Very happy costumer :)
Nice thick cables. Feels well made. Picture is a bit on the lighter side but adjusting tv display helps a bit
Was hesitant to buy this because I thought 6 feet would be too much. We are using all the time and I couldn't be more grateful for the extra stretch.
Replace an older much more expensive hdmi cord with this one.  WOW.  IT made my tv picture look amazing! We were missing out!

The first cable I received had damage in one of the pins, but I quickly received an expedited shipment of a replacement, that works well. Very well constructed, and it's a pretty good price for the long cable.

They work great for about a month. Then they all start to fail. 3', 6', 10' and 15' cables all failed. I used them for 4K HDR video and once they failed they were only good for 1080p at HDMI 1.4 specs. I had them replaced due to their one year warranty, and those all started to fail within the same timeframe as well. Replaced with certified cables from Monoprice for roughly the same price.

The cable is SUPER thick. Can’t fit it in my cable concealing equipment. I’m sure some people will like the super thick cable, but I consider it ridiculous. I’ve never had picture quality issues will the skinny HDMI cables.

Excellent product! Makes life so much easier and at 1/4 of the price if not less of the others out there! If youre lookin for reach with a cable tha can handle it all this is it! Held it up to a regular cord and this one looks like a piece of rope next to it!

Same cable is $2.99 on monoprice, but I wanted the 2-day delivery.  I have a huge box full of obsolete audio, video, and usb cables.  But I never have enough HDMI.  This is a reasonable product at a reasonable price and probably better quality than the monoprice option.

Why Apple TV does not come with HDMI I will never understand.... but this is the cord I bought for our new 4k Apple TV and the quality is great. I bought two because you know you always need another HDMI cord someday..
I bought this wire back in January 2019 and one has gone bad already so even though it's priced low it isn't such a great buy.
Perfect! Just needed it for working from home and definitely does the job! Best Buy was trying to charge $35+ for this thing, no thanks.

I experienced flickering and noise screen with external monitors on my MacBook Pro mid 2012. This product (along withThanks for your review of AmazonBasics Mini DisplayPort (Thunderbolt) to HDMI Adapter) resolved my problem. I am so happy I can finally work properly with an external monitor.
Works fine!  I needed a new cable to connect my new 4k tv to my receiver to play audio on my stereo speakers using the HDMI ARC connections.  This works great and is a decent price.
Got these to hook up a PS4 to a television.  Great quality.  Great price.  They work.  What more can you ask for?
These cords produce decently rezzd video playback. 1080 p was fine. Sorry but I don't have any 4k videos to test.
I just needed a cable to run another  monitor across the basement for our home gym. This cable was the right price and length and works great.
Bought them because I started working from come and needed to set up my home office. And I couldn'tbe happier.

I was looking for an inexpensive solution to supplying my laptop with an extra screen. I purchased this to connect to an external monitor and it meets my needs perfectly.
I bought a new computer, but didn't have the HDMI cable, so threw this in the cart. It worked fine, and I'm gaming away. Nice

My computer is an older model and when I ordered a new monitor, the monitor had only the HDMI ports but no cable. My computer also had the HDMI port, so I ordered the HDMI cable for the computer and monitor and it works great.

As described.  Just installed and so far very happy.  Wanted to write this review to let people know this cable is quite a bit thicker than other cables I have used.  About twice as thick as a dynex brand from Best Buy.  Could be difficult in tight spaces or if trying to hide the cable.

Wow, I love Amazon Basics products. This is my third Amazon Basics item that I have purchased and they have all been excellent quality and heavy duty. You will not be disappointed.
This hdmi cable is very good and worked perfectly. The quality also good for the price. The only thing is thicker than the normal hdmi cable.
i got it for my apple tv, high quality picture, high speed of data transfer, long enough, great quality, so worth the money
Finally! A quality reasonably priced HDMI cable! No issues with these. Picture and sound is great, seem to be good quality. Available in different lengths and pack sizes, which is a plus.
Work like it was advertised for. Bought quite a few of these and they all work very well between my splitter and extender that connect to a gaming pc switch and ps4 to my two share screen monitors.
Cable is a cable, works fine
Using this with an HDMI switch so I can run my PS3 and Gaming System through the same port on my TV.  Works well.

I like it’s quality and length. Sometimes it gets off and unplugs but mostly it works well. I am just taking one point off for exceptional times when it gets unplugged. Rest all good

if all you need is an HDMI cable for your game station or simply connecting your laptop to the TV, this is perfect.

Definitely does the job. However, this thing is HEAVY. The cord is very thick, which makes me hopeful that it will last a long time, but this makes it very stiff so it doesn't bend or move around as easily. The connections to my laptop and TV are very secure and do not wiggle or lose connection.
These do exactly as they say. The quality of your tv will affect how good the cords work.I highly recommend.

They do the job and I didn't pay through the nose. HDMI is a digital signal - either it works or there will be obvious issues. You're not getting a better picture by paying for fairy-dust infused cables. So just get these and call it good.

I purchased 6 cords and they worked great at first but, just as expected with every other brand I’ve purchased, including Apple these chargers always fall apart where the cord meets the plastic piece. First item from Amazon warehouse that didn't arrive damaged. It was the cheapest cable I could find for my guest room htpc.

This was a great deal. It's almost unreal how nicely they work with me connecting my HP laptop to my flat-screen TV.  The material is very durable for my application.  Its nice we to get something good all around.

The price is so much better then what I would pay in the stores.  Not even walmart has them at this price for this quality.  Will buy more as I need them.

It’s a good quality HDMI cable that performs exactly as advertised. I’ve seen cheaper, and I’ve seen lots more fancy… But this thing does everything it’s supposed to for a great price.

I purchased two of these cables to connect presentation laptops and iPads to two Samsung LED televisions in my office.  Both cables, on both monitors, and with different laptops and iPads cause the image on the TVs to flicker and sometimes go to black permanently.  I have upgraded the firmware on both Samsung monitors and all of the presentation laptops and iPads have the latest OS and video drivers installed.  It appears that these cables, for some reason, are unable to transmit the HDMI signal due to eventual signal loss along the cable path.

Yea don't overpay at the retail stores for hdmi cables. Talk to anyone who works at those places and you'll find the markup on cables is absolutely insane. Price is great and the quality is there. Did not know what to expect but was pleasantly surprised. Both at quality and promptness. Length and picture are great.

This cable works great and a lot better than some other high speed hdmi cables. I bought a new LG OLED TV and had issues with audio drops. After researching the topic I learned that it may be the HDMI cable....and it was true. With this one I am having no issues.
Works well and was a reasonable price.

These cables work very well. these are great.. have to jack into HDMI on some campuses and it small, compact and works like a charm.

That said, everyone recognizes Amazon and given the price of this cable, I doubt you need to think twice about buying it when there's a need. Don't waste your money on a fancy ripoff.

My new pc had HDMI output, whereas my old one had a different style. With this cable I can drive the TV from my pc. The picture and sound are just fine. It's a good value.

Great length, great price. I have no idea how Amazon sells these for so cheap. They work great too.We use our HDMI cable as a poor man's chrome cast. We can lay in bed and have our laptop connected by this cable alllll the way to the TV. It lets us be lazy all day and watch movies from our laptop.

You know, for a cheap cable, this one surprised me. I didn't notice any difference between this one and the Monster cable I had spent $40 on (which my children broke). I'm so glad this low price and quality was available. Now if they could just make the connection ends toddler-proof.
Works great. Bought this with our new Apple TV so we could cut the cable cord. Haven’t had an issue so far.

I expected a quality product and to get my money's worth and that is exactly what I received. Very happy with the product.

They look to be of good quality and are working. I am running a Sony playstation, Raspberry Pi, and a Sony Blue Ray player through these cables into a video switch which is connected to my Toshiba TV without issue.

This cable came in really handy when paired with my DotStone HDMI switch. I had no problems with it so far. It might have cost a bit, but it saves me the effort of trying to dig up some old cables that may not even work anymore.

I bought several of these cables to clean up the wiring of my home entertainment system and each of them work flawlessly. Sound and video through these cables are crystal clear. They feel well-constructed and provide a good solid and secure connection to all of the components with HDMI ports in my setup. The price per cable is tough to beat! Would definitely buy again.

This cable is as described in the heading. I was shocked at how "fat" the cable is, and how stiff it is. I have numerous other HDMI cables of varying lengths, although none are this long, however all are of the same "capacity" and all are much thinner and more flexible. I had intended to use it between my laptop and HD TV so I can use the TV as a monitor, however it  is impossible to use with a laptop because it is way too "heavy" and stiff, and it is impossible to coil and stow behind the TV when not in use. There is nothing in the description which alerts you to the "thickness" of the cable so now I am somewhat apprehensive about purchasing a different "brand" because I don't want anything like this again. Although I don't need an ultra-thin cable, I assume that's the only way I can be assured that I will be getting something "workable".

Great for the price, no concerns regardless of the TV or peripheral plugged in with it.  Thicker than I expected which, in an ideal world, is indicative of thicker/better shielding (but at minimum means it's a durable cable).

There was a two pack offered for the same price on your website. I know I selected it because I thought that was a good price. I only received a single item. These work great.  I can sit on my sofa (or bed), hook up to my laptop & tv & watch a clear picture from my laptop

I cannot get sound from the three I purchased. I bought a local set and they worked fine. Returned for refund due to being defective.

Cant complain. Getting three 6 foot HDMI cables for this price is just unbeatable. Don't waste your money on "tech" brands that throw unnecessary words and qualifications on their HDMI cables just so they can double or triple the price.

This is a review for the 10 ft cable.  Although they list this as the latest standard, let me save you the hassle.  This will not do 4k @ 60 Hz. I've seen the Amazon cheerleader with the screenshots saying this cable works with 4k and HDR. My cable did not.  I should've taken some screenshots with my Xbox one X error list (but I didn't).  I freaked out when I hooked this up to my Xbox one X and the system reported it would not do full 4k but only upscale to 4k for games. I added a compatibility option which then said it would do 4k and HDR for movies, but would still not do games in Native 4k with HDR. First problem was my Sony TV was not set to Enhanced HDMI mode.  When I corrected that, the screen had red snow all over the background.  I freaked out thinking my Xbox was broken or my TV was not working properly.  After a couple hours of troubleshooting, I traced it down to the new "latest standard" HDMI cable I bought from Amazon.  I also noticed that other people have run into the same issue specifically with the 10 ft cable (see the Q&A section). Amazon refunded my money without question and I was able to purchase a functional cable from another seller on Amazon.  It works great and my Xbox now has no issues with all of the 4k display options. Tried bad cable in other working TV & in fact is definitely now dead as well. Would not recommend at all.

This cord works great!  Its nice and thick and seems to be good quality. Its cheaper for me to just use this with a computer to watch shows than it is to rent another cable box.
No problems with the cables at all. I also believe that the price and quality will be hard to beat.

It works. No ghosting or signal loss in normal positions. Bending the cord very tightly (85 degrees) by the strain relief boots causes intermittent signal loss, but that's to be expected with thinner cables like these, since the only reason thicker cables don't have the issue is that they aren't flexible enough. Surprisingly robust.

Easy to set up and this was actually helpful since I have an HDMI splitter and it has four inputs on it.  I have the redesigned any ass classic and this is what I definitely needed it for since my TV only has three inputs on it for HDMI.

The AmazonBasics does the trick for HDMI cables. I've had a set installed over 4 months now and no difference from another (much higher priced) cable I have attached to the same TV.
Works great, can't tell the difference between this one and the one I spent $40 on at an electronics store.

Really great quality at a great price. I use AmazonBasics cables with my recording studio gear. Never any issues. Very durable. This particular cable is connected to my 2020 MacBook Air and external monitor via Apple adapter.

Amazon advertises it as "latest specifications" but the cable itself has no markings to indicate which version of HDMI it really is.  I would prefer to read version or specification 1.4 written somewhere on the cable or the packaging or the write up in the advertisement.

Not happy with these HDMI cables. The ends of the cables are SQUARED OFF right before the male HDMI connector. Many HDMI devices have their female HDMI ports recessed slightly. This squaring off of the cable ends blocks the cable from deeply seating in the HDMIi port of the device. An example of recessed HDMI ports is the XBOX One. I am constantly having to push the cable ends into the XBOX One HDMI ports to enable the video connection. The tips should be much flatter (tapered) as many other HDMI cables are. I cannot recommend due to this poor design flaw.
As I have come to realize, I trust all AmazonBasic products and this is no exception.Pros:

You can never go wrong with AmazonBasics items. These HDMI cables are no exception. Don't overpay for HDMI cables, a more expensive cable doesn't give any better quality because HDMI is digital! Never buy cables in store because they're a huge ripoff. Always buy your cables on Amazon.

Not the best but not the worst.  It will work for most applications and some will work for 4K 60Hz but some won't (which is why some of the reviews here seem to contradict each other).  The problem is that HDMI standards are kind of sketchy these days.  The current "high speed" HDMI spec requires 10.2 Gbps testing but companies are allowed to sort of cheat and extrapolate to say it should work for 18 Gbps.  The only way to know if a cable has actually been tested for 18 Gbps is if the cable is premium certified, which these aren't.  Monoprice sells premium certified cables for about the same price as these and blue jeans cables sells higher quality premium certified cables at reasonable prices.  I'd recommend BJC if you want to make sure you don't have issues between your high end 4K equipment or Monoprice if you want the lowest cost premium certified cables.

I needed a slightly longer HDMI cable for a client who required a PC tower at one far end of a desk to connect to a TV on the farther, opposite side. I bought a few different AmazonBasics cables all at the same time for this client. In the past, I always purchased name brand (I guess they'd be considered name brand and not generic) cables, such as Nippon Labs and Cable Depot. I never had any issues with these manufacturers, but since I was purchasing from Amazon this time, I decided to give AmazonBasics a shot. Amazon is like King Midas, everything they touch works out and turns to gold. So I imagined their cables would be par for course.I wasn't wrong. These cables are well designed, sturdy and they do their job just as well as the more expensive ones. Since HDMI is digital, there's no need to spend extra money on RocketFish or Monster cables. I will certainly in the future opt to purchase AmazonBasics, because their price is right and they function perfectly fine, just as well as any others.

I was using Monster Cables (very expensive) HDMI's for several years. I run all my HDMI's from my computer, Play Station, DirecTV box, Blue Ray DVD player through my Pioneer SC55 Receiver then to the 4K TV.  I know the Pioneer SC55 doesn't have 4K pass through but I'm going to upgrade in soon.  I thought the Pioneer was having problems switching from one component to another and back to the TV.  I decided to test the HDMI's when I upgraded my Samsung 4K TV with a Evolution Kit and called Samsung Support.  After about 40 minutes with support we decided nothing was wrong with the TV or the Evolution Kit.  We then decided to switch the main cable coming from the receiver to the TV.  That was the problem but it still was slow and sometimes got hung up.  I ordered these Amazon Basics High-Speed Cables and what a difference it makes.  Everything works better.  When I turn my TV and DirecTV box on it use to turn off the DirecTV box for some reason.  (you might think it was out of phase but it wasn't) It now works perfectly.  I know you don't have to buy expensive cables and they either work or they don't work.  But, if the pins are not connecting correctly it can cause a number of problems. So, I would highly recommend these cables.  They really solved my problems.

Super deal on these HDMI cords does not mean the quality is any less. I travel a lot and used to have to carry a separate monitor to work since I used two screens.  Now with every hotel having flat screens and most of them are equipped with the HDMI port, and my laptop has an HDMI port.  Now I just take my HDMI cord with me and hook up the hotel TV to my laptop and I have two screens without having to lug around another heavy monitor.  Now with that all being said, this is not my first order of cords!  My kids keep taking my cords for their gaming devices and I could never find one when I need it.  I bought four cords to ensure that I can find one when I need it now!  Also, now that we have Apple TV, Roku, and Fire Stick, I need the HDMI cables to run these and now I can leave the one attached to it is home TV, grab the box and take it where ever I go because I have spare HDMI cords!  I kept the plastic covers that go over the end of the plugs to replace them during travel to ensure the ports do not get disturbed during travel.  I like the 3 foot as it seems to be more than long enough for me and where ever I have had to use them without all the access cording which can hang and is so unsightly.

This is my first HDMI 2.0 cable and I didn't know what to expect. I picked it because it is the "latest standard" and is a long length at a low price and the Amazon Basics line seems to have a good reputation. The surprise to me was that this cable is so THICK and RIGID. It is around 3/8" or 1/2" thick and so stiff that it can be difficult to route or position the cable where you want/need it to be. At this size and weight, the cable really has a mind of it's own, so know that before you buy. Sheesh. Ready for the future, I guess. This thing is ridonkulous. I would return it if it weren't so reasonably priced. Now I need to find a place to store it. Do I rent a storage unit? I kid, but just barely.I have no idea if the ethernet, 3D or other advanced "2.0" features work as advertised. I only bought it to connect my laptop to my TV from across the room, and it did that just great. I admit that If I make this laptop>TV connection setup a habit I will probably purchase a standard (thin and light) HDMI cable for ease of use reasons.
